ground_truth_reviews.comment: This implementation for fetching posts by author iterates through the entire list of posts for every request. This is equivalent to a full table scan in a database and will lead to significant performance degradation as the number of posts grows. In a production environment, a database index on the `author_email` column would be essential to make this query performant.

title: feat: Add method to find posts by author
body: This change introduces a new service method, `get_posts_by_author`, to allow filtering posts by the author's email address. This will be used by a new API endpoint.
